text: <@UH9MMLXAS> The betfair docs are the best for the different order types. Regarding below the minimum, its dependant on currency, a trick to go below is to place a £2 order at 1.01, reduce to required using cancelOrders (eg. £0.10) and then use replaceOrders to move it to required price

elements.text: The betfair docs are the best for the different order types. Regarding below the minimum, its dependant on currency, a trick to go below is to place a £2 order at 1.01, reduce to required using cancelOrders (eg. £0.10) and then use replaceOrders to move it to required price

text: Note that when backing you can miss out the cancel as you can place an order of £0.01 (example) at 1000 and then replace to required price

elements.text: Note that when backing you can miss out the cancel as you can place an order of £0.01 (example) at 1000 and then replace to required price
